Reviews.Title: Very Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Jesler G. Garcia Rojas "jesler"
Reviews.Content: It is one of the best phones I have ever owned. The Corning Gorilla Glass is durable and scratch resistant. It has a great battery life, which is good, especially when you are on the move, using GPS. The Play Store has 1000's of apps to choose from. The phone has an amazing build quality, and is very tactile as well, the display is well lit, and it's easy to customise your phone, to your own liking. It is great for taking rainy day pictures when nothing else can survive.Pros:Resistance to dust, water, and shock,Solid feel,Easy to use with a single hand

Reviews.Title: Tough!
Reviews.Author: Katie Steele "cfs4"
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's very strong and stands up to frequent attacks from my 18 month old. We live at the beach so it's nice not to have to worry TOO much about what happens to it!

Reviews.Title: Phone Really Good - But NO US WARRANTY as Stated in the Description
Reviews.Author: Rayco Lloret "Rayco"
Reviews.Content: Phone is great!However, I received one that was defective.  When I called Samsung, they directed me to call the UK Samsung branch since this phone has no US Warranty.The phone that I received kept on restarting at different times.  Since the phone is defective, I shipped it back to Amazon and they have sent me out a replacement.Looking forward to receiving the replacement, and hoping that there are no issues.  If so, I'll keep it... for the price, I would happy to get one year trouble-free service.Note that there is also no warranty card with the phone.

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: heidi
Reviews.Content: I love this phone except for the phone storage! I can hardly have any apps on it without the phone saying that it has low storage even with having 17GB sd card in it!

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: gtp70
Reviews.Content: It is a good phone but does not have enough memory to hold much text. The supplier for this phone has been very good and can be recommended.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Equip
Reviews.Author: edward delgado
Reviews.Content: Excelent Samsung Gt-S5690L Galaxy XCover UnlockedI use it in my country no problem with any GSM lineThanks !!

Reviews.Title: Good beater phone
Reviews.Author: Name-o
Reviews.Content: I use mine in place of an iPhone while out on the boat. AT&T; callibg works but no internet unless on wifi. No worries if it gets rained on (for a bit) or splashed by salt water. I submerged the phone in a cup of water when I first got it and it survived about 2 minutes but haven't fell in the salt water with it yet.

Reviews.Title: todo en perfecto estado y funcionamiento, por qué tengo que escribir este montón de palabras si solo quiero calificar al vendedo
Reviews.Author: GHEILER
Reviews.Content: todo en perfecto estado y funcionamiento, por qué tengo que escribir este montón de palabras si solo quiero calificar al vendedor

Reviews.Title: Stopped Working After Only 6 Weeks
Reviews.Author: Yehudah
Reviews.Content: Exactly 6 weeks after I bought the phone it completely stopped working.  I treated the phone properly - it did not fall and did not receive any other damage.  I am very disappointed by this defective phone.I would recommend NOT buying this phone.

Reviews.Title: This cell phone is useless for conducting person contact
Reviews.Author: no name
Reviews.Content: I do ONLY phone calls on this phone (no texting, email, etc.) and it is difficult to turn on or off.  The screen displays change from one use to the next.  It locks itself and has to be turned off/on in order to get it back to normal.  I thought it would become easier to use/manage after I got use to the screens but that is not the case.  Since I do not depend on a cell phone but once or twice every other day or so (when I leave the house) - this thing is useless to me.  I wasted a lot of money on something that just looks nice.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900MHz frequencies and 3G Network HSDPA 900/2100MHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
IP67 Certified - Dust and Waterproof (up to 1m for 30 mins); 3.65" Capacitive Touchscreen with Corning Gorilla Glass and TouchWiz UI; 3.15MP Camera with Autofocus, LED flash and Geo-tagging; Stereo FM Radio; MicroSD, up to 32GB and Social Networking.
Android OS, v2.3 (Gingerbread); CPU 800 MHz Marvell MG2; GPS; Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi hotspot; Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP, EDR; Internal Memory 150 MB storage, 512 MB RAM; Accelerometer, Proximity and Compass Sensors and MP3 and MP4 Player.
Talk time Up to 13 h 20 min (2G)/Up to 11 h (3G)- Standby Up to 640 h (3G).
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung GT-S5690L Galaxy Xcover - Unlocked Phone - International Version - Black
